means: 吹毛求疵的反对意见或批评，遁词，模棱两可的话
使用遁词，含糊其辞，吹毛求疵

sentence.Network_en: Why quibble ? It just amounted to pulling an inconsiderate monkey.
sentence.Network_cn: 算了吧,直当是拉着个不通人情的猴子吧.

sentence.Network_en: Such a quibble did not trouble Livingston and his friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种诡辩并没有把利文斯顿和他的朋友难倒.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国法庭词汇翻译 | 法律英语翻译 ... questionnaire 调查表 quibble 狡辩 quick court 短期法庭.
quib 讥讽quibble 双关语quibbler 挑剔者
常用口语词汇27_专业词汇 ... querulous adj. 抱怨的，发牢骚的 quibble n. 遁词，挑剔 quiescent adj. 静止的，寂静的.
英语形近词归纳 ... pebble n. 小卵石，石子 quibble n. 遁词，吹毛求疵的反对意见 rabble n. 乌合之众，暴民，下等人.

list.abs: We had no patience quibbling criticism ., 我们不能忍受那种吹毛求疵的批评.
A - quibble money - back guarantee for goods returned within 14 days of receipt ., 收到后 14 天内退还的货物 , 保证无条件退款.
...penny for your thoughts：分享一下你在想什么quibble over：争辩琐事,诡辩bounce back：受挫折后恢复原状
It isn ' t worth quibbling over such a small amount ., 不值得为这样的小数目斤斤计较.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'play on words, pun'): diminutive of obsolete quib 'a petty objection', probably from Latin quibus, dative and ablative plural of qui, quae, quod 'who, what, which', frequently used in legal documents and so associated with subtle distinctions or verbal niceties

entry.def: When people quibble over a small matter, they argue about it even though it is not important.

example.ex: Council members spent the day quibbling over the final wording of the resolution...
example.tran: 委员会成员一整天都在为决议的最终措词争论不休。

entry.def: A quibble is a small and unimportant complaint about something.

example.tran: 这些不过是发发小牢骚罢了。

means.word_mean: 1. an evasion of the point of an argument by raising irrelevant distinctions or objections
1. evade the truth of a point or question by raising irrelevant objections

auth_sentence.content: Experts quibble over how big a part pedigree plays.
auth_sentence.res_content: Experts quibble over how big a part pedigree plays.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Experts quibble over how big a part pedigree plays.

auth_sentence.content: The experience itself is hard to quibble with.
auth_sentence.res_content: The experience itself is hard to quibble with.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The experience itself is hard to quibble with.

auth_sentence.content: But this is a minor quibble about a brilliant book.
auth_sentence.res_content: But this is a minor quibble about a brilliant book.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But this is a minor quibble about a brilliant book.

means.word_mean: 使用遁词,含糊其辞,吹毛求疵

sentences.en: They agreed as to the grand outlines,but quibbled over particulars.
sentences.cn: 他们对重大要点表示同意,但对细节却含糊其词。
